books.title: The Little Go Book
books.author: Karl Seguin
books.info: The Little Go Book is a free introduction to Google's Go programming language. It's aimed at developers who might not be quite comfortable with the idea of pointers and static typing. .

books.title: An Introduction to Programming in Go
books.author: Caleb Doxsey
books.info: A short, concise introduction to computer programming using the language Go.

books.title: Building Web Apps with Go
books.author: Jeremy Saenz
books.info: An introduction for building Web Apps with Go.

books.title: Build Web Application with Golang
books.author: astaxie
books.info: For those of you who are working with PHP/Python/Ruby, you will learn how to build a web application with Go.
